data.title: Virtual volume results
data.text:
Records not in Virtual Volumes

Several record sets (indexed by personal name and in other ways) allow searching or sorting results by place name, street name, parish, county, burgh or district. Read our guide on searching by place.

Search maps and plans.

Search statutory registers of birth, marriage, death, civil partnership, divorce and dissolution.

Search census returns.

Search church registers of baptisms, marriages and burials.

Search valuation rolls.

Search legal records, including wills and testaments.

Search Highland and Island Emigration Society records.

Search the image library.

Records on ScotlandsPlaces

On the ScotlandsPlaces website, National Records of Scotland makes available records arranged by county, parish, burgh and city, including:

Ordnance Survey Name Books

Seventeenth century hearth tax and poll tax rolls

Land tax, servants' tax, window tax, horse tax, and other assessed tax rolls
